artist: Utagawa Kunisada; Published by Enshūya Hikobei
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
marks: in toshidama cartouche: 豊國画 {Toyokuni ga}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
text: Related to the play Kakitsubata tamuke no Hanakawado 杜若手向花川戸, performed at the Kawarazaki Theater, 1850, 3rd month.
title: The Actors Iwai Kumesaburō III as Shirai Gonpachi and Arashi Kangorō I as the footsoldier (ashigaru) Kangohei
